snippet: The company also announced that it was abandoning plans to move from Whitehouse Station, N.J., to a new headquarters and would cut $2.5 billion in costs in the next two years.
abstract: Merck announces it will lay off 8,500 employees; also announces it is abandoning plans to move from Whitehouse Station, NJ, to a new headquarters and will cut $2.5 billion in costs in the next two years.
lead_paragraph: The company also announced that it was abandoning plans to move from Whitehouse Station, N.J., to a new headquarters and would cut $2.5 billion in costs in the next two years.

headline.main: Merck Plans to Lay Off Another 8,500 Workers
headline.print_headline: Merck Plans to Lay Off Another 8,500 Workers
